mapper.select: SELECT qnaSM.id, qnaSM.sellerId, qnaSM.title, qnaSM.comment, qnaSM.createDate, qnaSMreplies.id AS replyid, qnaSMreplies.parentId, qnaSMreplies.sellerId AS replySellerId, qnaSMreplies.comment AS replyComment, qnaSMreplies.createDate AS replyCreateDate FROM qnaSM LEFT JOIN qnaSMreplies ON qnaSM.id = qnaSMreplies.parentId ORDER BY qnaSM.id ASC, qnaSMreplies.createDate ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qnaSM (sellerId, title, comment, createDate) VALUES (#{sellerId}, #{title}, #{comment}, NOW());
